alert.note: Alert for Logan County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 22 at 8:12PM MDT until June 27 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Colorado... South Platte River at Atwood affecting Logan County zone. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON TO LATE TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...South Platte River at Atwood. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon to late Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.5 feet, Agricultural land floods along the river near Sterling. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM MDT Thursday the stage was 8.5 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.5 feet. &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
